website_summaries.verdict: Classic low-profile cosmetic  all-season tires favored by muscle-car owners.
pros: Features an even-wearing design for improved life and balanced tread-wear
Distinctive, raised white letter styling and quiet ride
cons: Will look strange when used in newer imports or non muscle-cars

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: These tires were purchased for a customer who needed raised white letter tires great classic look. If you want to leave rubber on the asphalt in your old classic muscle car these are a great choice
customer_reviews.author: frugal

customer_reviews.title: great tire
customer_reviews.text: first tire was right size on sticker but on wrong size tire. amazon exchanged it for the right sized tire with the right sized sticker on tire. very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: tew440

customer_reviews.title: Nice tires, not from the same lot but really ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice tires, not from the same lot but really nice. Mounted them myself, took them to the garage for balancing. Saved lots!
customer_reviews.author: WiFi75

customer_reviews.title: I’m liking these tires.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair. I can’t wait until my back tires wear out so I can order another pair and have them on all 4 wheels.
customer_reviews.author: C. S. Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Nice sleek look
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 1980 el camino. Nice so far, ride good although I haven't done any burnouts with them yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Everything I have brought off Amazon.has been just right
customer_reviews.text: Looking forward to buying another one soon.just what I wanted lot cheaper than at the tire store.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Green

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A good looking tire that performs and lasts. There is absolutely no road noise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dependable, long lasting tires
customer_reviews.text: I really feel safe knowing these tires are working for me. I own a small Mazda/Ford Ranger pickup and use it for work. I can always feel comfortable knowing that I have the best tires on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Need to know your vehicle's tire size and wheel width.
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfectly on my 15×8 wheels, price was the cheapest I found. love the raised white letters, quite happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Sam B

customer_reviews.title: Cooper cobra
customer_reviews.text: Great tire that looks awesome from being made in Mexico : )
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: They ride great, look great, and they were a great price. Seem to grip pretty well also
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Ride and look good for now
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Put two on back of old Sonoma that doesn't get used too much so everything is good for now. Great price, though!!
customer_reviews.author: 1son&3dogs

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: tire arrived sooner than expected, had them mounted and balanced locally for about $120 purchased 4 tires, locally dealers wanted $750 plus for same tire installed, I use these for my work suv saved about $150 doing a little leg work.
customer_reviews.author: Cajun Engineer

product_meta.title: Cooper Cobra Radial G/T All-Season P225/70R15 100T Tire
product_meta.description:
The Cooper Cobra Radial G/T All-Season P295/50R15 105S Tire features raised white letters for those who want to retain the characteristic ‘look’ of their classic muscle car. This all-season classic tire features refined tread element shaped to help disperse water and slush for excellent all-season traction. The Cobra G/T includes a notched center rib in the tread design which helps provide even treadwear. The shoulder slotting in the tread is designed for resistance to irregular wear while providing solid, all-season performance. The all-season performance tire offers white-letter styling designed for the muscle car enthusiast. The Cobra G/T is designed for even treadwear with all-season performance and a 50,000 mile warranty and free 45-day test drive. It is an all-season classic.

Rim Width Range 6.0-7.5 The approved wheel rim width range this tire will support.
Measured Rim Width 6.5 The recommended wheel width as recommended by the tire manufacturer to get the best wear us performance for this tire.
Section Width 9.1 The measurement from sidewall to sidewall.
Tread Width 7.2 The measurement from one side of the tread to the other side of the tread.
Overall Diameter 27.36 The height of the tire when fully inflated.
feature_bullets: Retains characteristic look of a classic muscle car
